column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Airport Police Station together with Police from Preah Sihanouk Provincial Department of Investigation and Procedure expelled 7 Chinese nationals at 19:30
column5: 2019.------Immigration police said that the Chinese nationals were: LIN XIANG HONG
column19: ------The men were detained on September 1st for internet fraud. The above Chinese nationals were expelled from the Kingdom on board QD712 (KOS-CHN)
column20: and banned from Cambodia for three years.
